pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena upāsakā bhikkhunisaṃghassa cīvaratthāya chandakaṃ saṅgharitvā aññatarassa pāvārikassa ghare parikkhāraṃ nikkhipitvā bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:6.3: “amukassa, ayye, pāvārikassa ghare cīvaratthāya parikkhāro nikkhitto, tato cīvaraṃ āharāpetvā bhājethā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:6.4: Bhikkhuniyo tena parikkhārena bhesajjaṃ cetāpetvā paribhuñjiṃsu.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:6.6: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṃghikena aññaṃ cetāpessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:7.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ upāsakānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:7.2: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:7.3: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṃghikena aññaṃ cetāpessantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:7.4: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṃghikena aññaṃ cetāpentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:7.7: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṃghikena aññaṃ cetāpessanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:7.8: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:7.9: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:8.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṃghikena aññaṃ cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:9.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:12.2: yaṃatthāya dinnaṃ, taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ cetāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:12.4: Nissajjitabbaṃ saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā ekabhikkhuniyā vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:12.7: “idaṃ me, ayye, aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṃghikena aññaṃ cetāpitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ, imāhaṃ saṃghassa nissajjāmī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:13.1: Aññadatthike aññadatthikasaññā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:13.2: Aññadatthike vematikā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:13.3: Aññadatthike anaññadatthikasaññā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
